title: Lodoss-tou Senki: Haiiro no Majo
original_name: ロードス島戦記 灰色の魔女
sinopse: Parn, the strong-headed fighter. Deedlit, the young and haughty elf. Ghim, the grizzled Dwarf. Etoh, the young priest. Slayn, the sorcerer. And Woodchuck, the thief. These six must again unite as the evil of the Grey Witch permeates all of Lodoss Island!
links: d in the greatest epic struggle between good and evil since the war of the goddesses.
